RNA-seq (poly-A enriched): TRIzol RNA Isolation for Cells. TRIzol (Life Technologies, 15596-018) RNA Isolation, performed following the manufacturer instruction to isolate total RNA with the following changes: 1) First centrifugation step at 12000 g and 4°C for 10 min (not 15 min). 2) Incubation in water bath at 55-60°C for 10-15 min. is skipped. Used 1 ml TRIzol per Sample. Followed by Isopropyl alcohol/Ethanol precipitation
